items.sentence: They didn't kill him. They just roughed him up a bit as a warning.
Tom said that he wants to spend another three days here in Boston.
Tom wondered whether he should let Mary go to Australia with John.
Tom told the police that I was the one who had stolen his bicycle.
Your hair's so smooth and pretty. What kind of shampoo do you use?
Tom's father is from Australia and his mother is from New Zealand.
I think that it's highly unlikely that Tom will ever be satisfied.
No matter how bratty Tom is, we have to try to get along with him.
Tom said that he wanted to be alone, and then went up to his room.
Tom said Mary knew that she might have to do that with John today.
